00015 const UInt_t fKeepRunning = 0x100000;
00016 
00017 void* RunRootGraphix(void* mutexptr)
00018 {
00019   TMutex* mutex = (TMutex*)(mutexptr);
00020   while(mutex->TestBit(fKeepRunning)){
00021     gSystem->Sleep(100);
00022     TLockGuard lock(mutex);
00023     if(gSystem->ProcessEvents())
00024       break;
00025   }
00026   return 0;
00027 }
00028 
00029 RootGraphix::RootGraphix() : 
00030   BaseModule("RootGraphix","Draw graphical canvases using the ROOT GUI"), 
00031   _app("app",0,0), _mutex(), _thread(RunRootGraphix), _mainframe(0)
00032 {
00033   _mutex.SetBit(fKeepRunning,true);
00034   _app.ProcessFile(".rootstart.C");
00035   RegisterParameter("single_window",_single_window = false,
00036                     "Use a single window to contain all canvases");
00037   RegisterParameter("window_w",_window_w = 700,
00038                     "Width of single window in pixels");
00039   RegisterParameter("window_h", _window_h = 700,
00040                     "Height of single window in pixels");
00041   
00042 }
00043 
00044 RootGraphix::~RootGraphix() 
00045 {
00046   Finalize();
00047   //_mutex.CleanUp();
00048 }
00049 
00050 int RootGraphix::Initialize()
00051 {
00052   CustomizeHistogramMenus();
00053   _thread.Run(&_mutex);
00054   return 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 int RootGraphix::Finalize()
00058 {
00059   if(_thread.GetState() == TThread::kRunningState){
00060     _mutex.SetBit(fKeepRunning,false);
00061     _thread.Join();
00062   }
00063   if(_mainframe){
00064     _canvases.clear();
00065     _mainframe->Cleanup();
00066     delete _mainframe;
00067     _mainframe = 0;
00068   }
00069 
00070   for(size_t i=0; i < _canvases.size(); i++)
00071     delete _canvases[i];
00072   _canvases.clear();
00073   
00074   return 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 int RootGraphix::Process(EventPtr )
00078 {
00079   for(size_t i=0; i < _canvases.size(); i++){
00080     Lock glock = AcquireLock();
00081     _canvases[i]->Update();
00082   }
00083   return 0;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 RootGraphix::Lock RootGraphix::AcquireLock()
00088 {
00089   return std::auto_ptr<TLockGuard>(new TLockGuard(&_mutex));
00090 }
00091 
00092 TCanvas* RootGraphix::GetCanvas(const char* title, bool preventclose, 
00093                                 bool hidemenu)
00094 {
00095   
00096   int n = _canvases.size();
00097   char name[100];
00098   sprintf(name, "canvas%d",n);
00099   TCanvas* canvas;
00100   Lock glock = AcquireLock();
00101   if(!_single_window){
00102     UInt_t wx = gClient->GetDisplayWidth();
00103     UInt_t wy = gClient->GetDisplayHeight();
00104     int topx = wx/2 * (n % 2) + 10*(n/4);
00105     int topy = wy/2 * (int)(n%4 > 1) + 10*(n/4);
00106     
00107     canvas = new TCanvas(name, (title == 0 ? name : title),
00108                          topx, topy, (int)(wx*0.49), (int)(wy*0.49));
00109     TRootCanvas* imp = (TRootCanvas*)(canvas->GetCanvasImp());
00110     if(imp && preventclose)
00111       imp->DontCallClose();
00112     if(imp && hidemenu)
00113       imp->ShowMenuBar(false);
00114   }
00115   else{
00116     if(!_mainframe){
00117       _mainframe = new TGMainFrame;
00118       _mainframe->DontCallClose();
00119       _mainframe->SetName("RootGraphixMainFrame");
00120       _mainframe->SetWindowName("daqman analysis display");
00121     }
00122     int nframes = n+1;
00123     int nx=1, ny=1;
00124     while(nx*ny<nframes){
00125       if(nx > ny)
00126         ++ny;
00127       else
00128         ++nx;
00129     }
00130     TGTableLayout* ml = new TGTableLayout(_mainframe,ny,nx,true);
00131     _mainframe->SetLayoutManager(ml);
00132     const int hints = kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY | 
00133       kLHintsFillX | kLHintsFillY |
00134       kLHintsShrinkX | kLHintsShrinkY | 
00135       kLHintsCenterX | kLHintsCenterY;
00136     
00137     //rearrange all of the existing frames
00138     int row=1, col=1;
00139     TList* subframes = _mainframe->GetList();
00140     if(subframes){
00141       TGFrameElement* el=0;
00142       TIter next(subframes);
00143       while( (el=(TGFrameElement*)next()) ){
00144         if(el->fLayout)
00145           delete el->fLayout;
00146         el->fLayout = new TGTableLayoutHints(col-1,col,row-1,row,hints);
00147         if(col < nx)
00148            ++col;
00149         else{
00150           col=1;
00151           ++row;
00152         }
00153       }
00154     }
00155     
00156     TRootEmbeddedCanvas* ec = new TRootEmbeddedCanvas(name,_mainframe);
00157     _mainframe->AddFrame(ec, new TGTableLayoutHints(col-1,col,row-1,row,hints));
00158     _mainframe->MapSubwindows();
00159     _mainframe->MapWindow();
00160     _mainframe->Resize();
00161     _mainframe->Resize(_window_w,_window_h);
00162 
00163     canvas = ec->GetCanvas();
00164   }
00165   _canvases.push_back(canvas);
00166   return canvas;
00167 }
